name: Sysadmin - Set full name and profile image

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Enter Full Name and Profile Image
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Open a new Mattermost Cloud instance as a sysadmin
  2. Enter your full name
  3. Select a profile picture
  4. Click Save Profile
inline.expectedResult: You should be progressed to Step 2, and the step counter in the sidebar should increment

inline.description:
Enter Full Name - No name provided
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Open a new Mattermost Cloud instance as a sysadmin
  2. Enter your full name
  3. Clear your name from the textbox
inline.expectedResult: 'Save Profile' button should be disabled, error message should display

inline.description:
Add Profile Image - upload file of wrong type
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Open a new Mattermost Cloud instance as a sysadmin
  2. Click the pen icon on the Select Profile element
  3. Select a file that isn't a .bmp, .jpg, or .png
inline.expectedResult: Error message should be displayed, 'Save profile' button should be disabled
